Pre-Game Insights: Jóhann Berg Guðmundsson expressed confidence in the team's preparation despite injuries.
The Icelandic team has dealt with several injuries leading up to the match, with key players missing.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will kick off at 6:45 PM at Laugardalsvöllur stadium in Reykjavík.
Ticket sales haven't been great, but that's just how it is.
The team that wins the group will be promoted to the A-division, while the last-place team will be relegated to the C-division.
Others: Jóhann Berg Guðmundsson hopes to entertain the fans at Laugardalsvöllur.
Captain Stevan Jovetic of Montenegro is currently without a club.
